room_title: Escape room "Defused" by The Escape Room in Winston-Salem
room_address: 3191 Peters Creek Parkway Winston Salem, NC 27127
room_description:
You are a part of the city's bomb squad, where you have just been informed, a bomb has been hidden in the city. Your team has successfully located the bomb, but now it's time to defuse it. There's just one problem, you have to solve the puzzles created by the bomber in order to defuse your bomb.
You have one hour to solve the puzzles, defuse the bomb, and save the city from mayhem and destruction!
